item.title: Rashi Peripherals Gains 3.04%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Momentum
item.description: Rashi Peripherals Ltd recorded a modest weekly gain of 3.04% from Rs.358.05 to Rs.368.95 between 5 and 9 January 2026, outperforming the Sensex which declined by 2.62% over the same period. The stock’s early-week surge, including a new 52-week high, was driven by strong intraday rallies and robust financial results, while the latter part of the week saw profit-taking amid broader market weakness. Time: 21 minutes ago

item.title: Alpex Solar Ltd Falls 7.46%: 3 Key Technical Signals Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Alpex Solar Ltd endured a challenging week from 5 to 9 January 2026, with its stock price declining by 7.46% to close at ₹763.75, significantly underperforming the Sensex’s 2.62% fall over the same period.
